20. What has been your most rewarding experience as a freelance travel writer?
21. How do you handle criticism, given your tendency to be critical of yourself?

24. What's your process like when you're preparing to visit a new destination?

29. How do you keep yourself motivated to keep exploring and writing?

31. How have your personal relationships been affected by your frequent travels?

37. What's the most adventurous trip you've ever taken?
38. How do you manage to maintain relationships while being on the road so often?
39. What's the most significant lesson your travels have taught you?

41. How has travel writing affected your view of your home country?
42. How do you handle the financial uncertainty that comes with freelance work?
43. What's the most rewarding feedback you've received from a reader?
44. How do you handle language barriers when traveling?
